executable.title: Segment Tube Seeds (TubeTK)
executable.description: Given an image and foreground and background masks, computes multiscale Jet (0, 1, and 2 order) features at each pixel, performs a multivariate discriminant analysis for separating the classes, and generates the LDA/PCA instances of the images.

parameters.label: General Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that control training and seed finding.

image.name: labelmap
image.label: Train label map
image.description: Label map that designates the object of interest.

file.name: loadTubeSeedInfo
file.description: Load vessel seed info from a file
file.label: Load vessel seed information

parameters.label: Training Parameters
parameters.description: Parameters that determine how the seed finder is generated.

double-vector.name: ridgeScales
double-vector.description: Scales at which ridge features are computed.
double-vector.label: Ridge scales

integer.name: objectId
integer.description: ID to be used in label map.
integer.label: ID of vessels in the label map

file.name: saveTubeSeedInfo
file.description: Save vessel seed info to a file.
file.label: Save vessel seed information

string.name: saveFeatureImages
string.description: Base filename for saving feature images.
string.label: Feature images base filename
